SEEALSO: SpreadsheetGetCellComment, SpreadsheetFormatCell, SpreadsheetGetCellFormula, SpreadsheetGetCellValue, SpreadsheetMergeCells, SpreadsheetSetCellFormula, SpreadsheetSetCellValue
DESCRIPTION: Sets the height of a row in a worksheet.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object to which to set the column width.
Specifies the row to set the height.
